remarks: An atom under a line is covered by it.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Jul-2012.)
statement:
atcvrlln2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
atcvrlln2.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
atcvrlln2.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
atcvrlln2.n $e |- N = ( LLines ` K ) $.
atcvrlln2 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A /\ X e. N ) /\ P .<_ X ) -> P C X ) $.
